channel.title: Akash Tandon
channel.description: Founder, builder, and writer. I write about startups, AI, and technology.

item.title: Four years a founder - Time
item.description: Learnings and anecdotes from four years as a startup founder - timing matters, accept the past and good things take time.
item.content:encoded: Learnings and anecdotes from four years as a startup founder - timing matters, accept the past and good things take time.

item.title: Lessons from building an AI feature that works - chunking and summarization
item.description: Lessons from creating a successful LLM-based feature for breaking down and summarizing user interviews, emphasizing how we nailed it by focusing on context, user feedback, and the right balance of AI and user experience.
item.content:encoded: Lessons from creating a successful LLM-based feature for breaking down and summarizing user interviews, emphasizing how we nailed it by focusing on context, user feedback, and the right balance of AI and user experience.

item.title: Brief lessons from using LLM APIs in production
item.description: Lessons that can help you when using large language models (LLMs) in a software production environment
item.content:encoded: Lessons that can help you when using large language models (LLMs) in a software production environment

item.title: Beyond Utility - The Role of User Experience in Enterprise Software
item.description: Frameworks to think about role of user experience when creating enterprise software
item.content:encoded: Frameworks to think about role of user experience when creating enterprise software

item.title: Understanding natural language technology through a project-first approach
item.description: Blueprint to understand recent advances in natural language technology in a hands-on manner. Topics covered include transformers, language models (BERT, GPT-2), evaluation benchmarks, and conversational interfaces/chatbots.
item.content:encoded: Blueprint to understand recent advances in natural language technology in a hands-on manner. Topics covered include transformers, language models (BERT, GPT-2), evaluation benchmarks, and conversational interfaces/chatbots.

item.title: Frameworks and philosophy for thinking about a startup co-founder
item.description: A guiding philosophy and collection of frameworks for thinking about a startup co-founder.
item.content:encoded: A guiding philosophy and collection of frameworks for thinking about a startup co-founder.

item.title: Gift of inspiration and its role in technology
item.description: Musings about inspiration, its importance for technological progress and a call for action to inspire those around you.
item.content:encoded: Musings about inspiration, its importance for technological progress and a call for action to inspire those around you.

item.title: Technology in law - a 10,000 feet overview of legaltech
item.description: A high-level overview of Legal Tech.
